channel.title: Airlock near generator has wrong light indicator [Fixed]
channel.description:
I think the green light should be at the open side right, not the closed side :smiley:
] getpos setpos 1744.287598 4016.125732 -1343.927490;setang -8.152025 129.088196 0.000965 ] status hostname: Half-Life 2 map : bm_c1a4d at: 1744 x, 4016 y, -1343 z [img]https://home.versatel.nl/westhof99/WrongLightsNearGenerator.jpg[/img]
